name: Mahjong Quest - Majong Games
description:
Download the most fun Mahjong game on iOS today! Play 2000+ Challenging and Addictive levels with increasing difficulty! Explore enchanting Fantasy lands and beautifully designed Mahjong Layouts!

Features:-

- 2000+ Levels of beautiful hand-crafted Majong layouts
- 10 Fantasy lands to conquer
- Easy to play, gets challenging as you level up
- Unlock more power-ups as you progress on levels and use them when you are stuck.
- Compete with your friends for High Scores
- Never lose progress, play on multiple devices

Improve your concentration and train your brain in the most fun way possible! It’s simply the best way to use your time whether you’re at Home, in a Cab, at the Subway or at the Coffee Shop! You’ll never be bored again!

Engaging twist over the plain vanilla classic Mahjong Solitaire! Play Now!
